description: Application for a non-material amendment following grant of planning permission ref: P/2011/0536 dated 31/03/2011 for Second floor extension to existing plant room; part first floor extension to west/south elevations; removal of existing stairwell to front; new glazed stairwell to western elevation; disabled persons parking/cycle parking to basement: amendments comprising ofApplication for a non-material amendment following grant of planning permission ref: P/2011/0536 dated 31/03/2011 for Second floor extension to existing plant room; part first floor extension to west/south elevations; removal of existing stairwell to front; new glazed stairwell to western elevation; disabled persons parking/cycle parking to basement: (Amendments comprising of re-positioned first and second floor windows and addition of two windows, only  to Northwest elevation facing Netheravon Road and Southeast elevation facing Hanwell Methodist Church).
